entities.name: memory charms
entities.description: Memory Charms can be broken by a powerful wizard, as I proved when I questioned her.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The boy, Harry Potter, whoever he was — was in danger —

entities.name: frank
entities.description: Out in the corridor, Frank suddenly became aware that the hand gripping his walking stick was slippery with sweat.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: But Memory Charms can be broken by a powerful wizard, as I proved when I questioned her. It would be an insult to her memory not to use the information I extracted from her, Wormtail.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The boy, Harry Potter, whoever he was — was in danger —

relationships.description: He was planning more murders — this boy, Harry Potter, whoever he was — was in danger —
But Memory Charms can be broken by a powerful wizard, as I proved when I questioned her. It would be an insult to her memory not to use the information I extracted from her, Wormtail.
Frank knew what he must do. Now, if ever, was the time to go to the police.
